text:
in org.apache.tomcat.loader.AdaptiveServletLoader.getClassPath()
a class path is constructed from the classP vector.

The result String cpath is continually appended to.
cpath should be a StringBuffer, and it should be
converted to a string after the class path is constructed.
creator: dev@tomcat.apache.org
cmanolache@yahoo.com
text:
AdaptiveServletLoader is no longer used except for jdk1.1 compat, URLClassLoader
is used instead. Also, this is not in "critical path", only on jsp compilation.
Will not be fixed ( or it has minimal priority, since the code is deprecated )
